There are 3 skinned meshes:
-RockGolem_1
-RockGolem_2
-RockGolem_3

There are Three material types:
\Materials-------------Default Materials
\Materials-Cracks------Materials with Glowing Cracks
\Materials-Runes-------Materials with glowing Runes

On each material folder there are 4 materials types:
-Crystal
-Rock
-Sand
-Stone

Select the desired material with same number of the selected mesh.
E.g. RockGolem_2.fbx with Golem_2_Stone
